verses.roman:
caitanya-cāpalya dekhi' preme sarva jana
śacī-jagannāthe dekhi' dena olāhana

synonyms: caitanya—Lord Caitanya; cāpalya—naughtiness; dekhi'-seeing; preme—out of love; sarva jana—all people; śacī—before Śacīmātā; jagannāthe—and Jagannātha Miśra; dekhi'-seeing them; dena—gave; olāhana—a little rebuke.
translation: When the neighboring people saw the naughty behavior of Lord Caitanya, out of love for Him they lodged complaints with Śacīmātā and Jagannātha Miśra.
